data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Lualaba you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,021,800 people living in Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lualaba.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lualaba who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 196,413 believers in Lualaba and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 196,413 believers in Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo.

data.focus_label: Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 1,021,800.

We estimate Lualaba has 196,413 people who might know Jesus, 740,037 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 85,350 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Lualaba, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
